tool_description: API that will return a Champion object containing a list of Abilities including the champions passive ability.
name: League Of Legends Champion Informaion
title: League Of Legends Champion Informaion

api_list.name: Get Champions
api_list.description:
Accepts a comma delimited list of champion names or nicknames.

Returns a list of Champions full names and list of passive ability and standard abilities in an on object format.

api_list.name: Get Champion Abilities as Text
api_list.description: Accepts a comma delimited list of champion names/nicknames and returns a text list of champions as well as their passive and standard abilities.
